title: I Am Enough: A Short Story
description: Phumzile Sithole is the unseen child who was too ugly and too stupid to be worth anything. Until someone SAW her. Experience a powerful and touching glimpse into the heart of the woman she became.With the speed of flash fiction and power of a vignette, I Am Enough is a story about the power of words to build up or to tear down; the power of education and believing in children. I Am enough is a story that takes you back to those moments when you were forgotten but more importantly, those times when you were SEEN.
author: Jen Samson
